name: 彭睿棠
objective:
作為實務室內設計訓練重要的理論基礎之一，本課程銜接「室內建築學」的課程教學；導引學生學習室內設計專案所涉包含基地平面計畫、風格與裝飾、家具與設備、色彩與材質、人因尺度等設計基本的概念與應用原理。
Being one of the plinths of the formal interior design training, the course extends the lecture of Interior Architecture to learn the concepts and the applications of site-planning, decoration, furniture, color scheme, materials, human factors etc. in the process of a professional interior design project.
